attributes.action: commit all members in the house of lords that they are not to be in collusion with any known criminal,alleged,or otherwise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow crb disclosures to stop any member of the houses of parliament,to disclose in a enhanced crb disclosure, any persons with a record of alleged offences,even mild offences ,and to stop any known member of the house of commons to have any interaction with known criminals of any kind,once they have had allegations of crimes against them,also no member is to be allowed in a government,position within parliament,once an allegation of criminal activity has been alleged or found to be attached to that persons,

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
